pollChanges

public boolean pollChanges(Project project,
                           Launcher launcher,
                           FilePath dir,
                           TaskListener listener)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: SCM
Checks if there has been any changes to this module in the repository. TODO: we need to figure out a better way to communicate an error back, so that we won't keep retrying the same node (for example a slave might be down.)

Parameters:
project - The project to check for updates
launcher - Abstraction of the machine where the polling will take place.
dir - The workspace directory that contains baseline files.
listener - Logs during the polling should be sent here.
Returns:
true if the change is detected.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

checkout

public boolean checkout(Build build,
                        Launcher launcher,
                        FilePath dir,
                        BuildListener listener,
                        java.io.File changelogFile)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: SCM
Obtains a fresh workspace of the module(s) into the specified directory of the specified machine.

The "update" operation can be performed instead of a fresh checkout if feasible.

This operation should also capture the information necessary to tag the workspace later.

launcher - Abstracts away the machine that the files will be checked out.
dir - a directory to check out the source code. May contain left-over from the previous build.
changelogFile - Upon a successful return, this file should capture the changelog.
Returns:
null if the operation fails. The error should be reported to the listener. Otherwise return the changes included in this update (if this was an update.)
Throws:
java.io.IOException

update

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> update(boolean dryRun,
                                               Launcher launcher,
                                               FilePath workspace,
                                               TaskListener listener)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Updates the workspace as well as locate changes.

Returns:
List of affected file names, relative to the workspace directory. Null if the operation failed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

createEnvVarMap

protected final java.util.Map createEnvVarMap(boolean overrideOnly)
Parameters:
overrideOnly - true to indicate that the returned map shall only contain properties that need to be overridden. This is for use with Launcher. false to indicate that the map should contain complete map. This is to invoke Proc directly.
